logsClearConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to clear all history?

customDomainsDescription.message: Add any domain you want to block. The entire site will be blocked when you visit it.

customDomainsHelpTitle.description: Help section title for custom domains

customDomainsHelpIntro.message: You can block specific websites or use wildcards (*) to block multiple related sites:

customDomainsExampleContains.message: Blocks any domain containing 'game' (e.g., games.com, mygame.net)

customDomainsExampleStartsWith.message: Blocks domains starting with 'news' (e.g., news.com, newsfeed.org)

customDomainsHelpTip.message: Tip: URLs are automatically cleaned - you can paste full URLs and ShortShield will extract the domain.

optionsTabCustomDomains.description: Tab name for custom domain blocking

optionsFullSiteDescription.message: Block entire sites, not just short-form content
optionsFullSiteDescription.description: Description for full site blocking section

scheduleDescription.message: Set specific times when blocking is active. Outside these times, all content will be allowed.

scheduleAddTimeRange.description: Button to add a new time range

scheduleRemoveTimeRange.description: Button to remove a time range

optionsTabAppearance.description: Tab name for block page appearance settings

blockPageTitle.description: Section title for block page customization

blockPageDescription.message: Customize how the block overlay looks when content is blocked.
blockPageDescription.description: Description for block page customization section

blockPageShowQuotesDescription.message: Display an inspiring quote on the block page

blockPageCustomQuotesDescription.message: Add your own quotes to display on the block page

blockPageNoCustomQuotes.message: No custom quotes added. Default quotes will be used.

blockPageShowBypassDescription.message: Allow temporarily bypassing the block (not recommended)

blockPageErrorUpdate.description: Error when updating block page settings fails

blockPageErrorDuplicateQuote.description: Error when quote is a duplicate

focusModeDescription.message: Enable distraction-free time blocks to boost your productivity.

focusModeEnabled.description: Toggle to enable focus mode feature

focusModeEnabledDescription.message: Allow starting focus sessions from the popup
focusModeEnabledDescription.description: Description for focus mode enable toggle

focusModeDefaultDurationDescription.message: Pre-selected duration when starting a focus session

focusModeSoftLockDescription.message: When disabled, you cannot cancel focus sessions before they end

focusModeNotificationsDescription.message: Show notifications when focus sessions start and end

focusModeActive.description: Indicator that focus mode is running

optionsTabFocus.description: Tab name for focus and pomodoro settings

pomodoroDescription.message: Use the Pomodoro Technique: 25 minutes of focused work followed by short breaks.

pomodoroEnabled.description: Toggle to enable pomodoro timer feature

pomodoroEnabledDescription.message: Allow using the Pomodoro timer from the popup

pomodoroWorkDurationDescription.message: Length of each focused work session

pomodoroBreakDurationDescription.message: Length of short breaks between work sessions

pomodoroLongBreakDurationDescription.message: Length of the long break after completing a cycle
pomodoroLongBreakDurationDescription.description: Description for long break duration setting

pomodoroSessionsBeforeLongBreak.description: Number of work sessions before long break

pomodoroSessionsBeforeLongBreakDescripti.message: How many work sessions to complete before a long break
pomodoroSessionsBeforeLongBreakDescripti.description: Description for sessions before long break setting

pomodoroAutoStartBreaksDescription.message: Automatically start break timer after work session ends

pomodoroAutoStartWorkDescription.message: Automatically start work timer after break ends

pomodoroSoundEnabledDescription.message: Play a sound when timer completes

timeLimitsDescription.message: Set daily time limits for each platform

timeLimitsEnabledDescription.message: Track time spent on platforms and enforce daily limits

timeLimitsWarningThresholdDescription.message: Show a warning when usage reaches this percentage of the limit

timeLimitsBlockWhenReached.description: Block when limit is reached setting

timeLimitsBlockWhenReachedDescription.message: Block content when the daily time limit is reached
timeLimitsBlockWhenReachedDescription.description: Description for block when reached setting

timeLimitsNoLimit.description: Shown when no limit is set for a platform

timeLimitsTodaysUsage.description: Title for today's usage section in stats

reportsDescription.message: Track and analyze how you spend time on social media platforms.

reportsEnabledDescription.message: Record daily usage statistics for analysis and reports

reportsDaysTracked.description: Label for number of days tracked

reportsNoData.message: No tracking data yet. Start using platforms to see your usage statistics.
reportsNoData.description: Message when no tracking data exists

reportsClearConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to clear all tracking history? This cannot be undone.

optionsTabStreak.description: Tab name for streak tracking settings

streakDescription.message: Build a streak by staying focused every day. Track your progress and earn milestone badges.

streakGoalTypeDescription.message: How to determine if you've achieved your daily focus goal

streakGoalFocusTime.description: Goal type: minimum focus session time

streakGoalBlocks.description: Goal type: minimum number of blocks

streakMinFocusMinutesDescription.message: Complete at least this many minutes of focus sessions per day

streakMinBlocksDescription.message: Block at least this many distractions per day

streakNotificationsDescription.message: Get notified when you reach milestones or lose your streak

streakResetConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset your streak? This will clear all progress and cannot be undone.

streakMilestoneMessage.message: Congratulations! You've reached a $DAYS$ day streak!

streakBrokenMessage.message: Your streak has been reset. Start a new streak today!

challengeDescription.message: Require solving a challenge before bypassing a block. Makes it harder to give in to distractions.

challengeEnabledDescription.message: Require solving a challenge to temporarily bypass blocks

challengeDisableBypassDescription.message: When enabled, there is no way to bypass blocks. Use with caution!

challengeTypeDescription.message: Choose the type of challenge you must solve to bypass

challengeDifficultyDescription.message: Higher difficulty makes it harder to bypass blocks

challengeCooldownDescription.message: Time to wait before you can attempt another bypass after a successful one

challengeTypeMathInfo.message: Solve arithmetic problems like addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division

challengeTypeTypingInfo.message: Type a word, phrase, or sentence exactly as shown

challengeTypePatternInfo.message: Find the next number in a sequence pattern

challengeDifficultyEasyInfo.message: Simple problems that can be solved quickly

challengeDifficultyMediumInfo.message: Moderate problems that require some thought

challengeDifficultyHardInfo.message: Complex problems that take time and concentration

lockdownDescription.message: Protect your settings with a PIN code. Prevent impulsive changes when willpower is low.

lockdownEnabled.description: Toggle to enable lockdown mode feature

lockdownEnabledDescription.message: Allow PIN protection for settings changes

lockdownActiveStatus.message: Lockdown mode is currently active. Settings cannot be changed.
lockdownActiveStatus.description: Status message when lockdown is active

lockdownPinInvalidFormat.description: Error when PIN format is invalid

lockdownCurrentPinRequired.message: Current PIN is required to change PIN
lockdownCurrentPinRequired.description: Error when current PIN is missing

lockdownPinSaved.description: Success message when PIN is saved

lockdownEmergencyBypass.description: Label for emergency bypass minutes setting

lockdownEmergencyBypassDescription.message: Time to wait before emergency bypass becomes available (without PIN)

lockdownActivateWarning.message: Once activated, you will need your PIN to change any settings.

lockdownEmergencyBypassInfo.message: If you forgot your PIN, you can request an emergency bypass. You will need to wait for the bypass timer to complete.

lockdownBypassReady.message: Emergency bypass ready! Lockdown has been deactivated.

lockdownInfoItem1.message: Lockdown prevents changing any settings without your PIN

lockdownInfoItem2.message: Emergency bypass allows recovery if you forget your PIN after waiting

lockdownInfoItem3.message: Choose a PIN you'll remember - but not one that's too easy to guess impulsively

commitmentLockDescription.message: Add friction to prevent impulsive unlocking

commitmentLockEnabledDescription.message: Require additional steps before unlocking blocked sites

commitmentLockLevelDescription.message: Higher levels make it harder to unlock

commitmentLockIntentionDescription.message: Must explain why you want to unlock

commitmentLockTimeLockDescription.message: Lock settings for a period of time

commitmentLockIntentionTooShort.message: Intention must be at least $1 characters
commitmentLockIntentionTooShort.description: Error when intention is too short

commitmentLockManyAttempts.message: You've attempted to unlock $1 times today

commitmentLockExplanation.message: Level $1 protection is active. Complete all steps to unlock.

commitmentLockAreYouSure.message: Are you sure you want to unlock?

commitmentLockIntentionLabel.message: Why do you need to unlock?

commitmentLockError_nuclear_mode.message: Nuclear mode is active - unlock disabled

commitmentLockWeeklyUnlocksRemaining.description: Label for weekly unlocks remaining in state display

commitmentLockScheduleRestrictionDescrip.message: Only allow unlocking during specific hours

commitmentLockNuclearConfirm.message: WARNING: Nuclear Mode will completely disable the ability to unlock blocked sites. This cannot be easily undone. Are you absolutely sure?

commitmentLockNuclearWarning.message: Nuclear Mode is ACTIVE. Unlock is completely disabled!
commitmentLockNuclearWarning.description: Warning when nuclear mode is enabled

commitmentLockRequireIntentionDescriptio.message: Must explain why you want to unlock

commitmentLockTimeLockDurationDescriptio.message: Hours before unlock becomes possible again

commitmentLockInfo1.message: Higher levels add more friction to prevent impulsive unlocking

commitmentLockInfo2.message: Escalating cooldowns make repeated attempts progressively harder

commitmentLockInfo3.message: Level 3 Premium features provide maximum self-control

commitmentLockError_outside_allowed_hour.message: Unlock only allowed during scheduled hours

onboardingFeature1.message: Block short-form videos on YouTube, TikTok, Instagram and more

onboardingScheduleWorkHoursDesc.message: Block content during typical work hours (9 AM - 5 PM, weekdays)

onboardingScheduleHint.message: You can customize your schedule in detail later

onboardingCompleteSubtitle.message: ShortShield is now protecting your focus

onboardingCompleteTip.message: Pro tip: Use the popup menu to quickly toggle blocking on/off, or start a focus session when you need extra concentration.

languageDescription.message: Choose the language for the ShortShield interface

languageReloadNote.message: The page will reload after changing the language to apply the new setting.
